name: Dead Air

task.app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 d3dx9 d3dx10 d3dx11_42 d3dx11_43
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Dead Air/xrEngine.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Dead Air
installer:
- task:
    description: Setting up wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Install to default location
    executable: $installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dcompiler_47 d3dx9 d3dx10 d3dx11_42 d3dx11_43
    description: Installing needed libraries
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
